name: Yuzi Lims: anime runner
description:
Yuzi Lims: anime runner is an endless runner in the anime style. The mission of player is to help the girl Yusi Lims trying reach his dreams, avoiding obstacles.

- Beautiful graphic in the style of anime
- Pleasant music
- Endless gameplay
- Steam achievements
Controls: Arrows and space bar
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
